title: [Skin Suggestion] Bewitching Ahri, Jinx, Lux and Soraka

replies.body: They're all twisted versions of star guardian skins.
Yeah, that was my thought as I was looking at them. The clothes are way too similar. They need to be wearing more of the same style as the other Bewitching skins.

Remove the bewitching

*Inverse Star -

Would legit buy it tho just for the anti-skin skin
Love the idea, but the referance material might go better as a Chroma
Yes
Better fits to 'Fallen Guardians'
God yess!!! Start guardians vs Fallen Guardians!!
Syndra could count as a Fallen... So now we need more!
why'd you title this bewitching when theyre clearly star guardian???
Cause i have bronze 4 english level
These are corrupted star guardians...
These are just star guardian chromas.
These champs dont need more skins
<3. Did you do the art for these? o.O
https://www.artstation.com/wyx83253953

> [{quoted}](name=Small Boobs Ahri,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WMGhNAjs,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-12-22T21:05:54.352+0000)
>
> https://www.artstation.com/wyx83253953

"Art student" What a JOKE. This person is crazy talented. How much could they improve from this? X_X

> [{quoted}](name=Final Spark Lux,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WMGhNAjs,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-12-22T21:19:49.516+0000)
>
> "Art student" What a JOKE. This person is crazy talented. How much could they improve from this? X_X

recolors and adding a bit of darkness to something already existing isnt talent

> [{quoted}](name=UnboundHades,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WMGhNAjs,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-23T00:16:00.344+0000)
>
> recolors and adding a bit of darkness to something already existing isnt talent

The idea may not have been theirs, but the art is, and they did this from scratch. They didn't recolor anything. Even recoloring thing takes skill to make it look good. If you didn't have anything nice to say, you didn't have to say anything at all. There's no reason to put anyone down because you have an opinion.

> [{quoted}](name=Final Spark Lux,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WMGhNAjs,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-23T00:41:24.659+0000)
>
> The idea may not have been theirs, but the art is, and they did this from scratch. They didn't recolor anything. Even recoloring thing takes skill to make it look good. If you didn't have anything nice to say, you didn't have to say anything at all. There's no reason to put anyone down because you have an opinion.

when you have a source to go off of there is nothing creative or talented about it and the artist didnt even add anything besides changing the colors to make it look like some halloween coloring book for a 5 year old the only one that got changed in any meaningful way was jinx and that was just the guns, also dont even try to say "if you dont have anything nice to say dont say it at all" if someone wants to be an artist and gets praised for this low quality recoloring then they will never improve to do actual art

> [{quoted}](name=UnboundHades,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WMGhNAjs,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-23T04:12:03.067+0000)
>
> when you have a source to go off of there is nothing creative or talented about it and the artist didnt even add anything besides changing the colors to make it look like some halloween coloring book for a 5 year old the only one that got changed in any meaningful way was jinx and that was just the guns, also dont even try to say "if you dont have anything nice to say dont say it at all" if someone wants to be an artist and gets praised for this low quality recoloring then they will never improve to do actual art

Except it isn't a recolor and was done from scratch, but ok, if you say so.

> [{quoted}](name=Final Spark Lux,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WMGhNAjs,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-23T04:13:19.321+0000)
>
> Except it isn't a recolor and was done from scratch, but ok, if you say so.

thats not being done from scratch means this was the artist looking at source material and drawing that without any thought put into it then adding color changes and small details if you want to praise this go ahead but a child could do this
You'd be surprised, an artist can ALWAYS do better.  And when looking at your own work it just about always looks like utter shit.
These are just star guardian skins with photoshopped colors to black.
WP, you've just discovered the existence of chromas.
Dark guardians?

No more Ahri or Lux skins please.

There are many champs in the game who deserve a skin more than they do.
Bewitching jinx looks too similar to SG Jinx but other than that i love it!
kawaii (╯✧▽✧)╯
YeeY
well these champs already have many skins tbh , what about a {{champion:136}}  skin ?

For the sake of the Universe, we do this.
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/005/616/qb.jpg

As star Guardian is my favorite skin set I love the idea of getting an anti version, but I would like it to be on unique Champions to expand on the skin line and universe and not on ones who already have them.

Rad as fuk art though I saved the Jinx one to be my phone wallpaper
I think they have enough skins...
So evil SG?
These skin concepts look amazing!!! 10/10 Would buy these skins day 1 of release, MAKE IT HAPPEN RIOT!!! {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

_More Buttwings!?!?!?_

Nah but the Jinx and Ahri ones look hella cool.
Looks cool but all I can imagine are complaints about how many skins they have

That is REALY well done .
{{sticker:sg-lux}}
These are hella cool!
